techmeme.title: Ex-FTX exec Ryan Salame's romantic partner is charged with campaign finance violations, a day after he said the US reneged on his plea deal by investigating her (Bloomberg)
Uber and Cruise sign a "multiyear strategic partnership" to make Cruise's self-driving vehicles available to riders on Uber from 2025 in an undisclosed city (Camilla Hodgson/Financial Times)
Donald Trump promotes his family's forthcoming crypto platform, The DeFiant Ones, in a post on Truth Social, mentioning a Telegram channel but few other details (MacKenzie Sigalos/CNBC)
NFT marketplace Magic Eden launches a mobile wallet app and will begin using a token to be issued by a foundation that supports the Magic Eden ecosystem (Olga Kharif/Bloomberg)
Sources: Stripe plans a tender offer to buy back shares held by current employees with its own cash; Stripe is offering $27.51/share, implying a $70B valuation (Cory Weinberg/The Information)
